situation: A 12m simple beam is loaded with a uniform load w = 40kN/m over the entire span and a concentrated load P = 200kN at the midspan. EI is constant.

subquestions.question: Which of the following most nearly gives the slope at the support due to the concentrated load only?
Which of the following most nearly gives the maximum slope due to the uniform load only?
Which of the following most nearly gives the maximum deflection due to the given loads?
